thread.title: Lori Schafer Joins Board of Directors at Kibo

author: cnbc.com
title: Lori Schafer Joins Board of Directors at Kibo
text:
Retail industry veteran brings 30 years of experience to unified commerce vendor
DALLAS--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Kibo , the world’s leading cloud-based omnichannel commerce platform, today announced that Lori Schafer has joined its board of directors. Lori is a senior executive and entrepreneur with 30 years of experience in retail and consumer-packaged goods' technology, marketing, merchandising, and supply chain. She currently serves as Executive Advisor, Retail, SAS Institute, a leading global analytics company. Lori consults with retailers and brands on their digital transformation strategies in today’s world of rapidly changing consumer expectations and omnichannel commerce.
Lori has served on the board of directors of various public and private retailers, consumer goods and technology companies. She is also a past board member of the National Retail Federation. Her experience with building retail technology businesses will serve Kibo well as it enters its next phase of growth.
“I can’t recall a time where this industry has experienced more rapid change than in the past few years,” says Lori Schafer. “It will only continue to accelerate, and both retailers and manufacturers must focus on innovation to thrive in the complex retail environments of tomorrow. I am so pleased to join Kibo’s board of directors to provide strategic guidance, as well as to support their mission of driving seamless, personalized experiences across omnichannel touchpoints. Kibo’s investments in predictive machine learning, scalable cloud architecture, and API-first development will position the company as a true partner for merchants who are looking to drive unique brand experiences for their customers.”
“I am thrilled to have Lori join Kibo’s board of directors,” says David Post, CEO, Kibo. “Her deep background in the retail industry, combined with her experience in scaling technology companies, will enable our organization to provide more value to our customers and partners. As Kibo further expands, Lori’s guidance and informed insights will prove invaluable as we look to make strategic business decisions.”
In 2010, Lori co-authored the business book Best Seller, Branded! How Retailers Engage Consumers with Social Media and Mobile, which predicted how mobile technology and social media would change the face of retail in just a few short years. From 2003 to 2009, Schafer served as President of SAS Retail. During that time, Lori was instrumental in building SAS Institute’s global leadership position in retail analytics.
Prior to her tenure at SAS, Lori served as Chairman and CEO of Marketmax, Inc., an analytics software company specializing in merchandise planning and analytics software, which was acquired by SAS in 2003. Prior to that, Lori started her career at Procter & Gamble. She graduated Summa Cum Laude and first in the school of Applied Science with a degree in Mathematics and Operations Research from Miami University.
Organizations looking to learn more about Kibo may visit kibocommerce.com or visit Booth # 1117 at IRCE, June 5-8.
About Kibo
Kibo is a leading omnichannel commerce platform for retailers and branded manufacturers with over 800 customers fulfilling orders in 75 countries. Clients achieve optimal performance and loyalty through truly connected customer experiences across customer devices and retail touchpoints. Kibo’s unified approach includes a leading ecommerce platform, big data 1:1 personalization, mobile POS, and distributed order management delivered via a modern, cloud-based infrastructure. The Kibo platform can scale as clients grow their business while maintaining a low cost of ownership and faster time to market than other solutions. Kibo enables you to reach higher peaks of sales and customer loyalty. No matter the challenge, Kibo powers your success.
For more information, visit kibocommerce.com .
